Service

Energy Enhancement System

General WellnessUnplug & Relax⏱ 1–3 hours
← Back to servicesContact us

Overview

EES provides a quiet, restorative lounge experience. Many guests use it for deep rest, meditation, or reflective downtime.

What it is

Screens are arranged to create a specific electromagnetic environment sometimes described as 'bio-scalar fields'. We frame EES as a relaxation modality—not a diagnosis or treatment.

Potential benefits

  • Encourages a relaxed, restful state
  • Time away from devices and notifications
  • Pairs well with sleep and mindfulness habits

Session flow (what to expect)

  1. Arrive a few minutes early and settle in.
  2. Set a simple intention (rest, breathwork, quiet).
  3. Recline with optional eye mask and blanket.
  4. Hydrate after the session and notice how you feel.

Safety notes

  • This is a general wellness session, not a medical therapy.
  • If you have implanted electronic devices or are pregnant, consult your clinician before trying new wellness practices.

Sources & references

  • FDA — General Wellness guidance↗

How to book

Message us your preferred times and we’ll confirm availability.
